mapper.select: SELECT seq_animal seqAnimal, seq_protector seqProtector, seq_doctor seqDoctor, animal_name animalName, animal_type animalType, animal_size animalSize, animal_age animalAge, animal_gender animalGender, animal_weight animalWeight FROM Animal WHERE seq_protector= 1 and seq_animal = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE Animal SET animal_picture = #{animalPicture} , animal_video = #{animalVideo} , animal_name = #{animalName} , animal_type = #{animalType} , animal_size = #{animalSize} , animal_age = #{animalAge} , animal_weight = #{animalWeight} , animal_update_date = now() WHERE seq_protector= #{seqProtector} and seq_animal = #{seqAnimal}
